text: "Ballerina Girl" is a 1986 song by Lionel Richie and was taken from his third studio album Dancing on the Ceiling. It went to number 7 in the United States, number 17 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Canada, number 18 in France and number 43 in Australia. ==Track listings== 7" Single # "Ballerina Girl" - 3:36 # "Deep River Woman" - 4:35 ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Lionel Richie songs
title: Ballerina Girl
